member.name: M:SuperMap.Layout.MapLayout.PrintToFile(System.String,SuperMap.Layout.PrintFileType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Outputs all the content within the paper extent of the layout to file. This method supports setting for output file type and the DPI output format. For a large sheet of map with high-volume data, you can use this interface to output the map to a certain type of high-resolution image, and then print the map.
member.param: The full path of the output file.
Sets the type for the output image.
The number of dots per inch for image output.
member.returns: Returns true if successful, otherwise false.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Layout.MapLayout.PrintToFile(System.String,SuperMap.Layout.PrintFileType,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Outputs all the content within the paper extent of the layout to file. This method supports setting for output file type and the DPI output format. For a large sheet of map with high-volume data, you can use this interface to output the map to a certain type of high-resolution image, and then print the map.
member.param: The full path of the output file.
Sets the type for the output image.
The number of dots per inch for image output.
Indicates whether to export a map to multiple pages. True means exporting the map to multiple pages, and false means exporting the map to a single page.
member.returns: Returns true if successful, otherwise false.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Layout.MapLayout.HitTest(SuperMap.Data.Point2D,System.Double)
member.summary: returns the collection of selected layout elements. If the is distance between the specified point and the nearest point in the layout element is less than the tolerance, then the layout element is selected. If there are more than one layout elements meet the condition. Then they will all be selected and returned with a collection of them.
member.param: The specified point object.
The specified tolerance.
member.returns: The collection of the selected layout elements.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Layout.MapLayout.AdjustLayoutPaperSize
member.summary: Sets the layout page (excluding margins) to fit the extent of all geometry objects, i.e. adjusting the size of the layout page into the minimum bounding rectangle of all geometry objects in the layout.
member.returns: Returns true if successful, otherwise false.

member.name: M:SuperMap.Layout.MapLayout.OutputLayoutToPDF(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Output the layout as a PDF file.
member.param: Specify the path to save the PDF file, the path is the full path containing the file name.
When the layout output is PDF, if the layout contains raster type map data or illustrated pictures in the layout, you can specify the output resolution here. The default value is 96.
member.returns: The output returns true if successful; otherwise, it returns false.
